title: About company VERES
text: ABOUT US VERES BRAND TODAY More than 27 years unique expertise in vegetable growing and producing canned fruit and vegetables 7 000 ha land fund of agro-industrial complex 950 employees employees in three regions of Ukraine 2 full cycle production facilities and logistic center with full cycle More than 100 products More than 25 countries in export destinations of Veres products The adoption of technology food trends for health and comfort!
